ygData.subject: Re: Clothing  **spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: In Felwithe, you find the Sr. robes from some of the other guildmasters.  I got mine off of the Enchanter s guildmaster.  Comes out to a little over 4pp for
ygData.messageBody:
In Felwithe, you find the Sr. robes from some of the other
guildmasters. I got mine off of the Enchanter's guildmaster. Comes
out to a little over 4pp for me.

--LimDul

>Ximena
